qas.question: How many major highways cross through Oklahoma City?

context: Oklahoma City is an integral point on the United States Interstate Network, with three major interstate highways – Interstate <a0_0>3<a0_0/>5, Interstate 40, and Interstate 44 – bisecting the city. Interstate 240 connects Interstate 40 and Interstate 44 in south Oklahoma City, while Interstate 235 spurs from Interstate 44 in north-central Oklahoma City into downtown.
